page.title: 12Railways in Retford
page.content: The main line{Inter-city service } London-Edinburgh cuts through the western edge of the area.The line crosses the canal and several roads before reaching the station.Newark is 18 mins to the South and Doncaster 16 mins to the north. The{East-West,Sheffield-Lincoln line } passes beneath the main line before entering our area.On Thursday afternoon when we are at games as many as 8 coal trains pass the field (both irections).They carry{coal to the } {power stations}of the Trent valley and return to Manton pit in Worksop.{Passenger multiple units } occasionally pass by ,perhaps one every four hours on average. The infants went to{Cleethorpes}for a day and passed the field on their way out of Retford.
